title: To insert a JavaScript into an HTML page, which tag is used?

How does Java Script store dates in objects of Date type?
answer1: The number of days since January 1st, 1900
answer2: The number of seconds since January 1st, 1970
answer3: The number of milliseconds since January 1st, 1970

right: The number of milliseconds since January 1st, 1970

title: Which of the following is not a valid JavaScript variable name?
Why so Java and JavaScript have similar name?
answer1: Java Script is a stripped-down version of Java
answer2: The syntax of JavaScript is loosely based on Java syntax
answer3: They both support Object Oriented Programming
right: The syntax of JavaScript is loosely based on Java syntax
